message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can find a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16000. This is the best price I can offer at this point.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my budget constraints. I would like to counter with an offer of $15000 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $16500. This is the lowest price I can offer and still make a profit.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $15500 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as high as $15500, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $16250. This is the best price I can offer and still make a profit.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $15750 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as high as $15750, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $16100. This is the best price I can offer and still make a profit.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $15800 for the product.
